analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x3dcf5acdbd2060c8f92c2a36c289904a3ad1dbf7.sol:
	Contract MGCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3dcf5acdbd2060c8f92c2a36c289904a3ad1dbf7.sol#210)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x3dcf5acdbd2060c8f92c2a36c289904a3ad1dbf7.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
